concept.name: joule [Entity] (SI base energy unit. It is the work done when the point of application of 1 Newton is displaced a distance of 1 Meter in the direction of the force.)

attr.obj: systeme international unit (The class of Systeme International (SI) units.)
unit of energy (Every instance of this class is a unit of measure that can be used to form instances of energy measure)
